title: Something creative
creator_credit: Crafts Council of Australia and Gillian Leahy
brief_description: This film looks at the question of creativity in everyday life and examines the role of the professional artist in stimulating and encouraging participation in the arts by the community at large. Focuses on Orange and Blacktown in New South Wales. Cinematography by Erika Addis.
creator_credit_for_label: Crafts Council of Australia and Gillian Leahy
